verses.name: Nehemiah 7:58
verses.text: The children of Jaala, the children of Darkon, the children of Giddel,

verses.name: Nehemiah 7:59
verses.text: The children of Shephatiah, the children of Hattil, the children of Pochereth of Zebaim, the children of Amon.

verses.name: Nehemiah 7:60
verses.text: All the Nethinims, and the children of Solomon’s servants, were three hundred ninety and two.

verses.name: Nehemiah 7:61
verses.text: And these were they which went up also from Tel–melah, Tel–haresha, Cherub, Addon, and Immer: but they could not shew their father’s house, nor their seed, whether they were of Israel.

verses.name: Nehemiah 7:62
verses.text: The children of Delaiah, the children of Tobiah, the children of Nekoda, six hundred forty and two.
